projects.title: OML Alexandria -  In-browser Language Server for OML
projects.bodyText:
- Project lead for class project to create in-browser language server for specification language OML. 
 - Implemented backend features such as dynamic renaming, annotated hover, cross references, etc.

projects.title: Qsim Vortex
projects.bodyText:
- Implementation of accelerated quantum statevector simulation on the open-source Vortex GPGPU simulator (inspired by cuQuantum sdk) 
 - Worked on the distributed gate application and index swap.

projects.title: ColdGAN Implementation
projects.bodyText:
- Implementation of ColdGAN Paper in Pytorch for use in an augmented approach to dealing with the cold-start problem for recommendation systems 
 - Coded using the CNN GAN pytorch example as a starting point.

projects.title: VTA File Open
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented static analysis algorithms using Wala in order to catch “File not closed” errors. 
 - Implemented bytecode injection using Wala shrike in order to fix “File not closed” errors automatically

projects.title: NJR AWS CodeGuru Reviewer
projects.bodyText: - AWS CodeGuru scripts for analyzing all NJR projects and parse security flaws from the CodeGuru Results.

projects.title: Knovigo
projects.bodyText:
- An iOS App that tracks COVID-safe and crowded areas.
 - Worked on the Swift Frontend for the Recommendations Page.

projects.title: Noti.fi
projects.bodyText:
- A simple image-based reminder website - Users are sent reminders via push notifications, email and text, as well as repeated weekly/monthly reminders 
 - Implemented the backend features of this project

projects.title: Reminder Bot
projects.bodyText: - A discord reminder bot that parses a spreadsheet and pings a reminder at the specified time.
